name: Everything
desc: This has a very self-explanatory name. It contains every thing that exists!

name: 2-D
desc: Multiple lines on a single plane.

name: 3-D
desc: Infinite planes stacked on top of each other.

name: 4-D
desc: Time effects all of the previous dimensions.

name: 5-D
desc: Probablility deviates from the straight line of time.

name: 6-D
desc: A faster way to warp through the 5th and 4th dimensions, like the 3rd dimension with the 1st and 2nd dimensions.

name: 7-D
desc: All possible 5-D outcomes through different starting conditions.

name: 8-D
desc: All possible 6-D outcomes through different starting conditions.

name: 9-D
desc: All possible outcomes through any starting condition.

name: Universe
desc: A single rigid 4-dimensional space with a definite outcome.

name: Multiverse
desc: Many universes, all with the same starting point but different outcomes in 5-dimensions.

name: Point
desc: A 0-dimensional point in space. No width, height, or depth, although it may have duration.

name: Line
desc: Multiple points that are connected with length, without height or depth in one dimension.

name: Coordinate Plane
desc: An imaginary 2-D space with width and length.

name: 3-D Space
desc: An 3-dimensional space with length, height, and width.

name: Timeline
desc: A 4-dimensional collection of 3-dimensional spaces that effect each other chronologically.
